title: Theatre Scrub RN
text:
Are you a registered Theatre Scrub Nurse looking for new opportunities in the healthcare industry? Then this is the position for you!

Our client based in Johannesburg is in need of a Theatre Scrub RN for their private hospital based on the East rand.

The following requirements are a prerequisite to be considered for the position:

Registered with SANC

Diploma or Degree in Nursing

Postgraduate Diploma in Operating Theatre Nursing

2 + Years’ experience in scrubbing

+ Years’ experience in scrubbing Prior experience within a private hospital preferred

Should you meet the requirements for this position, please email your CV to pharmacy.jobs@staffingprojects.co.za. You can alternatively contact Gillian on XXX-XXXX or visit our website on www.staffingprojects.co.za.

Please note that correspondence will only be conducted with short listed candidates within 3 days of application received

Then this is the position for you!  Our client based in Johannesburg is in need of a Theatre Scrub RN for their private hospital based on the East rand. ...
